amendment.description: An amendment numbered 57 printed in Part B of House Report 118-602 to reduce the salary of Ya-Wei (Jake) Li, Deputy Assistant Administrator for Pesticide Programs, to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller (IL) amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 148 - 267, 1 Present (Roll no. 390).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Miller (IL) amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 148 - 267, 1 Present (Roll no. 390).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
